answers.answer: I was ravenous weeks 37 and 38. I talked to my Dr because I had already gained 30 pounds and really didn't want to blow up more at the end. He said she is still growing and just try to continue to make healthy choices even if they are larger portions to satisfy my hunger. I am 40 + 2 days and have gained 36 this whole pregnancy.
I've only gained 8 lbs so far. I'm 177 and I have gestational diabetes. I wonder if it's bc my lil girl is growing too.

question: I'm 37weeks 5 days and seems like the past 3 days I've been extremely hungry. Anybody else going through this?
title: increased Appetite
